monster.name: Cultist Initiate

trait.name: Obscure Devotion
trait.text: Gains advantage on saving throws against being frightened if within 15 ft. of a cult leader.

action.name: Dagger
action.text: Melee or Ranged Attack: +3 to hit, reach 5ft or range 20/60 ft., one target. Hit: 4 (1d4 + 1) piercing damage.

monster.description: Source: GM Toolkit Monthly (Sinister Cult) p. 17 (Third Party)

monster.name: Cultist Fanatic

trait.name: Obscure Devotion
trait.text: Gains advantage on saving throws against beingfrightened if within 15 ft. of a cult leader.

action.name: Spellcasting
action.text:
The fanatic a 2nd-level spellcaster. Its spellcasting ability is Charisma (spell save DC 12, +4 to hit with spell attacks). It has the following spells prepared:
• Cantrips (at will): Thaumaturgy, Sacred Flame. • 1st Level (3 slots): Command, Inflict Wounds

action.name: Dagger
action.text: Melee weapon attack. +4 to hit. Reach 5 ft. One target. Hit: 5 (1d6+2) piercing damage.

monster.spells: Thaumaturgy, Sacred Flame, Command, Inflict Wounds
monster.description: Source: GM Toolkit Monthly (Sinister Cult) p. 18 (Third Party)

monster.name: Cult Hierophant

trait.name: Obscure Devotion
trait.text: Allies gain advantage on saving throws against being frightened if within 15 ft. of the hierophant.

trait.name: Spellcasting
trait.text:
The heirophant is a 6th-level spellcaster. Its spellcasting ability is Charisma (Spell save DC 15, +7 to hit).
• Cantrips (at will): Thaumaturgy, Prestidigitation, Toll the Dead • 1st Level (4 slots): Charm Person, Command, Shield of Faith • 2nd level (3 slots): Hold Person, Mirror Image, Bestow Curse, Suggestion

trait.name: Will of the Patron
trait.text: Cult allies within 10 ft. of the hierophant can't be charmed or frightened unless the hierophant is incapacitated.

action.name: Staff
action.text: Melee weapon attack: +4 to hit. Reach 5ft. One taraget. Hit: 5 (1d6+1) bludgeoning damage.

action.name: Soulflare
action.text: One creature the hierophant can see within 60 ft. must make a DC 15 Wisdom saving throw or take 21 (6d6) psychic damage and be stunned until the end of its next turn.

monster.spells: Thaumaturgy, Prestidigitation, Toll the Dead, Charm Person, Command, Shield of Faith, Hold Person, Mirror Image, Bestow Curse, Suggestion
monster.description: Source: GM Toolkit Monthly (Sinister Cult) p. 19 (Third Party)

monster.name: Death Cultist

trait.name: Bloodletting Slash
trait.text: The cultist deals an extra 5 (1d8) necrotic damage when it deals damage to a creature that is frightened or charmed.

trait.name: Final Rites
trait.text: When the death cultist is reduced to 0 hit points, all creatures within 5ft. must succeed on a DC 13 Wisdom saving throw or be frightened until the end of their turn.

action.name: Dagger
action.text: Melee weapon attack: +4 to hit, reach 5ft, one target. Hit: 7 (1d6+3) piercing damage plus 5 (1d8) necrotic damage if the target is frightened or charmed.

action.name: Morbid Fascination
action.text: One creature the death cultist can see within 60 ft. must attempt a DC 13 Charisma saving throw. ON a failure, the creature is frightened of the death cultist until the end of their next turn. On a success, the creature is charmed by the death cultist until the end of their next turn.

action.name: Necrotic Pulse
action.text: The cultist exhales a wave of shadow in a 15-foot cone. Each creature in the area must make a DC 13 Constitution saving throw, taking 11 (3d6) necrotic damage on a failed save, or half as much on a success.

monster.description: Source: GM Toolkit Monthly (Sinister Cult) p. 20 (Third Party)

monster.name: Elemental Cultist (Water)

trait.name: Tide's Grasp
trait.text: Creatures that start their turn in water conjured by the water cultist must succeed on a DC 13 Strength saving throw or fall prone.

trait.name: Spellcasting
trait.text:
The cultist is a 3rd-level spellcaster. Its spellcasting ability is Wisdom (spell save DC 12, +4 to hit with spell attacks).
• Cantrips (at will): Thaumaturgy, Frostbite, Shape Water • 1st Level (4 slots): Create or Destroy Water, Command • 2nd Level (2 slots): Hold Person, Mirror Image

action.name: Staff
action.text: Melee weapon attack: +3 to hit, reach 5 ft, one target. Hit: 5 (1d6+1) bludgeoning damage plus 3 (1d4) cold damage.

action.name: Chilling Tide
action.text: The cultist unleashes a wave of freezing brine in a 15-foot cone. Each creature in the area must make a DC 13 Constitution saving throw. On a failed saving throw creatures take 14 (3d8) cold damage and their movement is halved until the start of the cultist's next turn. Characters take half damage and do not lose their speed as much on a successful saving throw.

monster.spells: Thaumaturgy, Frostbite, Shape Water, Create or Destroy Water, Command, Hold Person, Mirror Image
monster.description: Source: GM Toolkit Monthly (Sinister Cult) p. 21 (Third Party)

monster.name: Elemental Cultist (Fire)

trait.name: Ashen Rebirth
trait.text: When the cultist is reduced to 0 hit points, it erupts in a blaze. Each creature within 10 ft. must succeed on a DC 13 Dexterity saving throw or take 7 (2d6) fire damage, taking half damage on a success.

trait.name: Spellcasting
trait.text:
The cultist is a 3rd-level spellcaster. Its spellcasting ability is Charisma (spell save DC 12, +4 to hit with spell attacked). It requires no material components.
• Cantrips (at will): Produce Flame, Thaumaturgy • 1st Level (4 slots): Burning Hands, Hellish Rebuke • 2nd Level (2 slots): Hold Person, Mirror Image, Scorching Ray

action.name: Mace
action.text: Melee weapon attack: +3 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 5 (1d6+1) bludgeoning damage plus 3 (1d4) fire damage. The target cannot benefit from invisibility until the end of its next turn.

monster.spells: Produce Flame, Thaumaturgy, Burning Hands, Hellish Rebuke, Scorching Ray
monster.description: Source: GM Toolkit Monthly (Sinister Cult) p. 22 (Third Party)

monster.name: Elemental Cultist (Wind)

trait.name: Wind Walker
trait.text: The cultist has advantage on saving throws against effects that would cause it to be restrained or grappled.

action.name: Handaxe
action.text: Melee weapon attack: +5 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 7 (1d6+3) slashing damage plus 3 (1d4) thunder damage.

action.name: Shrieking Gale
action.text: The cultist conjures a burst of violent wind in a 15-foot cone. Each creature in the area must succeed on a DC 13 Strength saving throw or be pushed 10 ft. away and knocked prone. Objects and flames in the area are extinguished or blown aside.

action.name: Gale Dash (Bonus Action)
action.text: As a bonus action, the cultist can move 15 ft. without provoking opportunity attacks.

monster.description: Source: GM Toolkit Monthly (Sinister Cult) p. 23 (Third Party)

monster.name: Elemental Cultist (Earth)

trait.name: Galvanic Grip
trait.text: The cultist has advantage on saving throws against being knocked prone or moved against its will.

action.name: Maul
action.text: Melee weapon attack: +4 to hit, reach 5 ft., Hit: 9 (2d6+2) bludgeoning damage.

action.name: Earth Tremor
action.text: The cultist causes a tremor in the ground centered around them in a 10-foot radius. Each creature other than the cultist in the area must make a DC 13 Dexterity saving throw or take 6 (1d10) bludgeoning damage and be knocked prone. The area becomes difficult terrain.

reaction.name: Earthen Fortitude
reaction.text: When the earth cultist takes bludgeoning, piercing, or slashing damage from a non-magical weapon, they can use their reaction to reduce the damage by 5.

monster.description: Source: GM Toolkit Monthly (Sinister Cult) p. 24 (Third Party)

monster.name: Fiend Cultist

trait.name: Hellbound Reinforcements
trait.text: Once per day, the cultists can cast Spirit Guardians without using a spell slot.

action.name: Spellcasting
action.text:
The cultist is a 6th-level spellcaster. Its spellcasting ability is Charisma (Spell save DC 14, +6 to hit with spell attacks). It does not require material components.
• Cantrips (at will): Thaumaturgy, Fire Bolt, Minor Illlusion • 1st level (4 slots): Hellish Rebuke, Command, Bane • 2nd level (3 slots): Crown of Madness, Mirror Image • 3rd level (2 slots): Spirit Guardians, Bestow Curse

action.name: Longsword
action.text: Melee weapon attack: +4 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 7 (1d8+2) slashing damage plus 4 (1d6) fire damage.

action.name: Pact Sigil (Bonus Action)
action.text: The cultist marks a creature they can see within 60 ft. The marked creature gains 10 temporary hit points. If the marked creature dies before the end of the cultist's next turn, the cultist regains an expended spell slot of 2nd level or lower.

monster.spells: Thaumaturgy, Fire Bolt, Minor Illlusion, Hellish Rebuke, Command, Bane, Crown of Madness, Mirror Image, Spirit Guardians, Bestow Curse
monster.description: Source: GM Toolkit Monthly (Sinister Cult) p. 25 (Third Party)

monster.name: Cult Leader

trait.name: Magic Resistance
trait.text: The cult leader has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magic effects.

trait.name: Cult Devotion
trait.text: If the cult leader is concentrating on a spell, it can't be charmed, and allies within 10 ft. have advantage on saving throws against being frightened.

trait.name: Spellcasting
trait.text:
The cult leader is an 18th-level spellcaster. Its spellcasting ability is Charisma (spell save DC 17, +9 to hit with spell attacks). It can cast disguise self and invisibility at will.
• Cantrips (at will): Toll the Dead, Thaumaturgy, Shocking Grasp, Mage Hand, Prestidigitation • 1st level (4 slots): Detect Magic, Mage Armor, Command, Magic Missile • 2nd level (3 slots): Mirror Image, Hold Person, Misty Step • 3rd level (3 slots): Counterspell, Fly, Lightning Bolt • 4th level (3 slots): Banishment, Stoneskin, Greater Invisibility • 5th level (3 slots): • 6th level (1 slots): Globe of Invulnerability • 7th level (1 slots): Plane Shift • 8th level (1 slots): Mind Blank • 9th level (1 slots): Time Stop

action.name: Dagger
action.text: Melee or ranged weapon attack: +7 to hit, reach 5ft., or range 20/60 ft., one target. Hit: 6 (1d4+3) piercing damage plus 9 (2d8) psychic damage.

reaction.name: Soulbrand
reaction.text: If the cult leader hits a creature with its dagger, it may invoke a soulbrand: the target must succeed on a DC 17 Charisma saving throw or be cursed for 1 minute. While cursed in this way, the target has disadvantage on Wisdom saving throws and cannot benefit from healing spells. The target may repeat the save at the end of each of its turns.

monster.spells: Toll the Dead, Thaumaturgy, Shocking Grasp, Mage Hand, Prestidigitation, Detect Magic, Mage Armor, Command, Magic Missile, Mirror Image, Hold Person, Misty Step, Counterspell, Fly, Lightning Bolt, Banishment, Stoneskin, Greater Invisibility, Globe of Invulnerability, Plane Shift, Mind Blank, Time Stop
monster.description: Source: GM Toolkit Monthly (Sinister Cult) p. 26 (Third Party)
